item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – V NAV

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided procedures do not require their use.

note.para: For RVSM en route operations, any one of the following autopilot modes will provide acceptable altitude hold capability:
Use operative vertical modes to follow desired flight path. FLCH and V/S must be operative.

placard.para: Placard V NAV Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
